name: Digger & Diggur
description:
Disclaimer: the downloadable version of the game looks better than the WebGL one. Be sure to try it out!

Heavy sound of rocks falling, pickaxes and screams

DIG!!

It’s your only chance to get through this, if there even is one. As Digger or his brother Diggur, you will have to get along digging at the same time to escape from this GIANT falling rock. Your harmony will need to be on point if you want to be faster than the rockslide…

Digger & Diggur is a fast-paced coop game for 2 players in which you will either play Digger or Diggur.
In this endless game, your coordination, reflexes and patience will be tested if you want to go as deep as possible and beat your high score!

Dig again and again, break stones and strike moles to stay alive! 

Keyboard Player 1: W/A/S/D

Keyboard Player 2: Arrow keys

Controller: A/B/X/Y

Alexandre Janin - Game Design, Programming, 2D Art

Baptiste Figeac - Game Design, 3D Art

Raphaël Marteaux - Original Soundtrack, Sound Design


This game was developed for Ludum Dare 48 around the theme "Deeper and Deeper". We hope you will enjoy Digger & Diggur! 

Your opinion matters ! Please rate the game on the official Ludum website : 
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/digger-diggur
